function RYU_EP04_06()
    -- .起-4【11月第2週】「急襲！ 姫神エルメス！」
    SaveData.Title = "急襲！ 姫神エルメス！"

    -- //BG：和室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ That day, the entire academy was buzzing with talk about Hermes all day long. ]])

    MSG([[ It had been a while since Hermes had shown her face at the academy. ]])

    MSG([[ Not only did people gather in Hermes's classroom during break time, but there were even students across the school who sneaked out of classes to come see her. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1736.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 “S-Speaking of which... isn’t it known that Hermes is coming to this Japanese-style room? If it got out, it wouldn’t just be a discussion...” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0541.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smiling
 “Please rest assured. I’ve asked Lira for help. Using her skills, she’s been skillfully drawing the students’ attention outside the school building.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0542.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Wry smile, sweat
 “This is the first time Hermes has attended school here so seriously, so I guess the first-years were quite taken aback by her influence.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1737.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Sad
 “Yes... To be honest, I underestimated it. If Uran hadn’t prepared a temporary nurse’s office, who knows what would have happened.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(2000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0543.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 “...But all of that, I learned from Marika-sama.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1738.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “From Marika...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran spoke with a faraway look of nostalgia. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0544.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smiling
 “Yes, it’s nostalgic. When Hermes first enrolled, she seemed different, almost overwhelmed by her own popularity.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0545.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smiling
 “After school, Hermes, Daria, and I would gather at Marika-sama’s place and discuss strategies until late into the night.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0546.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “It was tough, but those were very enjoyable days.” ]])

    MSG([[ ――Those were enjoyable days._r Contrary to her words, a tint of sadness lingered in Uran’s expression as she spoke. ]])

    -- LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1739.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Daria, did you really lie to me?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I, too, had spent joyful time with Daria. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn't believe that all the time we shared was a lie. Together with Uran, I resolved once again to uncover the truth. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（苦笑）、エルメス（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fc")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,1000,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,850,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

STOP_BGM(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0462.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Serious
 “Sssneak... sssneak...” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ga")
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0547.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Flustered
 “Um, Hermes-sama? What have you been sneaking about since earlier?” ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,850,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0463.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Flustered
 “Caught me!? I was planning to sneak in with a joke and surprise you all!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,850,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)

    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0464.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Sad
 “Uran-chan is terrible... She keeps the serious mood going and makes it hard to joke around.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0548.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “I-I'm so sorry...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1740.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 “N-No! I don’t think you have anything to apologize for, Uran-san!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1741.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 “Hermes-san doesn’t need to make jokes when entering, okay? Just come in normally.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 400, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0465.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Wink
 “Hehe~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">” ]])

    MSG([[ “Ah, she probably doesn’t get it,” I thought, but decided to keep quiet since it would be tacky to say more. ]])

    MSG([[ Time is limited. We need to get to the main topic quickly. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1742.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 “Let’s get straight to it. There are many things I want to ask you, Hermes-san.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0466.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 “Sure, sure. I’ll answer anything! Though with a few exceptions!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0549.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 “Why has Daria-san been absent from the academy? Not saying anything for a whole month made us worried.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0550.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 “She seems to have a different aura than before... Is it related to Hermes beginning to come to school at this timing?” ]])

    MSG([[ Well done. That’s Uran for you. ]])

    MSG([[ Rather than asking directly, she framed it as concern for Daria, making it easier for Hermes to answer. ]])

    MSG([[ As I watched to see how Hermes would answer, she opened her mouth with her usual bright, innocent smile. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0467.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 “It’s related<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">! Because Daria-chan adjusted her work so I could make memories at Yuriai Private Academy until graduation!” ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1743.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 “Daria-san adjusted her work?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0468.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Normal
 “Yep! Daria-chan even handled part of my manager duties, and she shuffled my schedule so I could attend school from today until graduation!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0469.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 “It’s thanks to Daria-chan that I could attend the entrance ceremony, the summer Princess Election, and the school festival<sprite="Emoji" name="note">.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0470.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 “Even when I cried because I wanted to attend Yuriai Private Academy, or when I hesitated about entering the last Princess Election, she always supported me... She’s my proud big sister!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1744.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 “I see... so that was the case.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ After all, it’s the large-scale schedule of a national idol. ]])

    MSG([[ It wouldn’t be strange if organizing it took a month. Actually, it might be even sooner than expected. ]])

    MSG([[ It all added up. I would have accepted it before. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1745.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 (Behind Hermes’s actions... Daria was always there.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ If only there hadn’t been Akira’s report of seeing Daria apologizing to Marika. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0551.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 “Thank you. I now understand the reason for Daria-san’s absence well.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0552.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “But what about what happened to Erika this morning? Throwing a woman away just because she came near, that wouldn’t have happened before.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0553.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “I worry something might have happened to Daria-san.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0471.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Surprised
 “Yeah, that surprised me too. I think Daria-chan is trying her best.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0472.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Normal
 “Daria-chan’s mother told her to be careful that I don’t come into contact with the ‘Princess’ recklessly. I don’t know why, though.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0473.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 “Actually, the reason I asked to meet you both today is related to that. I have a favor to ask!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1746.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 “A favor?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0554.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Surprised
 “For us?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0474.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Serious
 “Yes! From now until graduation, I want you to go on dates with me on the holidays!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1747.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 “D-Date? With you, Hermes-san?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ We tilted our heads at this unexpected request. ]])

    MSG([[ But Hermes looked completely serious. She didn’t seem to be joking with us. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1748.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 “I don’t mind that at all. But why would you make such a request?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0475.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Sad
 “Like you both saw this morning, wherever I go, Daria-chan follows me and I can’t even hang out with my friends...” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0476.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 “But I want to go out and have fun with the ‘Princesses’! Because I love everyone!” ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes’s eyes glistened as she looked at us. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s hard to say no when looked at with such pure eyes, making you want to help her. ]])

    MSG([[ Also, during the dates with Hermes, we might be able to uncover some information about Daria’s suspicions. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m sure Uran would agree with this too. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1749.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Yes, of course. If you don’t mind us—” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Just as I was about to answer— ]])

    -- //CI：140
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI140a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0555.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “E-Erika-san...” ]])

    MSG([[ Uran tightly grasped my hand. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I was startled and stopped speaking. What could it be? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0477.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Surprised
 “Erika-chan? What’s wrong?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1750.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Wry smile, sweat
 “Ah, ah, no. Sorry, please let me think about the date matter a little.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1751.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 “I’ll give you my RINE ID, so let’s talk again. I want to cooperate, really.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 400, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0478.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Wink
 “Waaaaay<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">! Thank you, Erika-chan! I love you!” ]])

    MSG([[ I tore a page from my notebook, wrote my contact, and handed it to Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ Meanwhile, Uran’s expression remained somewhat gloomy. She watched the exchange between Hermes and me with a worried look. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0479.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 “Erika-chan, Uran-chan! Thanks for today! I really love you! Let’s talk a looooooot on RINE again~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">” ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ After saying that, Hermes bounced up and hurried out of the Japanese-style room. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    -- //BU：ウラン・悲しみ

    MSG([[ Left alone with Uran, I faced her and asked. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1752.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 “What happened to you?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0556.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “I-I was very surprised by my own reaction...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1753.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 “Please tell me. I will accept whatever it is.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1754.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Wry smile
 “Just like you believed the story about what happened to Marika from me.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Taking my words, Uran began to speak hesitantly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0557.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “I-I was afraid.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1755.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 “Afraid? Of going on dates with Hermes-san?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0558.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “N-No... It was because Erika-san...” ]])

    MSG([[ Looking up at me, Uran spoke unexpected words. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0559.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “I couldn’t bear the thought of you going on ‘dates’ with girls other than me.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1756.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 “I-I see...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That said, I didn’t quite understand. Going on dates with girls isn’t that unusual. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0560.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Flustered
 “I’m really sorry. I understand it’s not strange for Erika-san to go on ‘dates’ with Hermes-san.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0561.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “But my heart fluttered, and I impulsively grabbed your hand. This feeling is new to me, so I’m confused.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0562.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “But I can’t help wanting you by my side.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0563.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 “If I invited you on a ‘date,’ I’d be worried if you accepted like you did this time.” ]])

    MSG([[ C-Could it be that Uran was ‘jealous’ of Hermes? ]])

    MSG([[ From her story, it seemed she was unconscious of it. It was clear she felt complicated emotions about me dating the most beautiful girl in the school. ]])

    MSG([[ I heard Uran hadn’t had many friends before... maybe this was her first time feeling this way about someone. ]])

    MSG([[ She might be very confused inside. ]])

    MSG([[ Thinking so, I found the woman in front of me incredibly endearing. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1757.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 “If you invite me on a date, Uran-san, I’d be happy to join you.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0564.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Surprised
 “R-Really? L-Like even this week...?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1758.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 “Yes, of course. If you like, why don’t we have a practice date together now to help ensure Hermes has better dates in the future?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0565.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Blushing
 “With you, Erika-san... heh.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0566.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Flustered
 “B-But this weekend...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1759.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 “Is there a problem? If it’s difficult, we can do it next week instead.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0567.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Wry smile, sweat
 “N-No, this is more important. I’ll contact my escort and reschedule.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0568.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Blushing
 “This is my dream date with Erika-san. I’ll make time for it no matter what.” ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing Uran’s happy face, free of earlier worries, I laughed. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1760.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Wry smile
 (Thank goodness. Uran smiled. I’m not wrong, right... Marika?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Honestly, to find clues to save Marika, maybe I should go on dates with Hermes as soon as possible. ]])

    MSG([[ But I think it would be wrong to prioritize my goal over betraying Uran, who truly cares for me. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if Marika were beside me, I think she would say the same. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1761.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 “Then let’s stay a bit longer and discuss where to go this weekend. Uran-san, is there anywhere you want to visit?” ]])
